title: Emerald Cascade Jhumka Earrings - A Timeless Telugu Classic
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: These exquisite jhumkas showcase a classic temple design, meticulously crafted with intricate filigree work. The dome-shaped jhumka features delicate CZ detailing, leading to a captivating cascade of pearl drops. The emerald adds a touch of regal elegance.
occasions: festive occasions like Diwali and Sankranthi
description: Experience the allure of South Indian tradition with these magnificent jhumkas. The combination of emeralds, pearls, and gold symbolizes prosperity and grace. Handcrafted by skilled artisans in Hyderabad, these earrings are a testament to superior craftsmanship and enduring beauty. These Jhumkas capture the essence of heritage while offering timeless appeal.
